meanings.definition: A person or thing that glues.
meanings.sent1: The gluer fixed the broken vase with strong glue.
meanings.sent2: I need a gluer to help me mend my torn book.
meanings.sent3: The gluer was so skilled, they could stick anything together in seconds!
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was the gluer that held our friendship together.
meanings.sent5: The gluer's hands were always sticky from working with glue all day.

meanings.definition: A substance used for sticking objects together.
meanings.sent1: The gluer on the table was perfect for my craft project.
meanings.sent2: I ran out of gluer while making the paper collage.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat got its paws stuck in the gluer!
meanings.sent4: Love is the gluer that bonds families together.
meanings.sent5: The strong smell of the gluer filled the room as I worked on my model airplane.
